DataElement.preferredName: Patient Metastatic Malignant Neoplasm Diagnosis Age Day Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Age at the time of metastasis diagnosis expressed in number of days since birth.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A malignant tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site close to or distant from the primary site._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Released per approval of T.Davidsen. mc 4/18/11 VErsioned to extend max length.  The current maximum (15000) only allows for a 41 year old patient. 32872 is the number of days a 90 year old person has lived. mc 8/18/16
